events.message: The client submitted a personal loan application seeking funds to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan as the client intends to use the funds for medical and debt purposes.
Assigned a loan officer specialized in personal loans to handle the case and provide personalized customer support.
The initial review of the loan application was conducted to verify completeness and initial eligibility requirements.
Requested supporting documents from the applicant, including medical bills, income proof, and identification to proceed further.
Received all requested documents from the client in a timely manner, including detailed medical receipts and employment verification.
Completed credit check for the applicant revealing a moderate credit score with punctual repayment history on existing obligations.
Performed risk assessment identifying a manageable risk profile due to stable employment but some existing personal debts.
Presented a loan offer including terms and interest rate suitable for the applicant’s financial situation and repayment capacity.
Received positive feedback from the client expressing satisfaction with the offer and eagerness to proceed with the loan.
The loan was officially approved after thorough evaluation and confirmation that all criteria were met satisfactorily.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover the specified medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Conducted follow-up to ensure the applicant is managing repayments well and to offer any additional support if needed.
Closed the loan application file after confirming that all initial stages have been completed successfully and satisfactorily.
